languages.text: "Цвета этого места полнятся вспышками боли — ярко-алыми, багрово-черными, предсмертно-серыми... калейдоскоп отчаяния и безумия..."
"The colours of this place are flecked with sparks of pain — bright scarlet, blackish crimson, deathly grey... A kaleidoscope of despair and madness..."
languages.original_text: "Цвета этого места полнятся вспышками боли — ярко-алыми, багрово-черными, предсмертно-серыми... калейдоскоп отчаяния и безумия..."

traits.locale_text: "The colours of this place are flecked with sparks of pain — bright scarlet, blackish crimson, deathly grey... A kaleidoscope of despair and madness..."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The colours of this place are flecked with sparks of pain — bright scarlet, blackish crimson, deathly grey... A kaleidoscope of despair and madness..."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “这个地方的色彩，夹杂着痛苦的火花——鲜艳的猩红色、发黑的深红色、死亡的灰色……一个充满了绝望与疯狂的万花筒……”
languages.original_text: "The colours of this place are flecked with sparks of pain — bright scarlet, blackish crimson, deathly grey... A kaleidoscope of despair and madness..."

traits.locale_text: “这个地方的色彩，夹杂着痛苦的火花——鲜艳的猩红色、发黑的深红色、死亡的灰色……一个充满了绝望与疯狂的万花筒……”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Los colores de este lugar están salpicados de chispas de dolor: escarlata intenso, carmesí oscuro, gris mortal... Un caleidoscopio de desesperación y locura...».
languages.original_text: "The colours of this place are flecked with sparks of pain — bright scarlet, blackish crimson, deathly grey... A kaleidoscope of despair and madness..."

traits.locale_text: «Los colores de este lugar están salpicados de chispas de dolor: escarlata intenso, carmesí oscuro, gris mortal... Un caleidoscopio de desesperación y locura...».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「この地の色には、苦痛の火花が瞬いている。明るい緋色、黒い深紅、死をまとった灰色…絶望と狂気の万華鏡…」
languages.original_text: "The colours of this place are flecked with sparks of pain — bright scarlet, blackish crimson, deathly grey... A kaleidoscope of despair and madness..."

traits.locale_text: 「この地の色には、苦痛の火花が瞬いている。明るい緋色、黒い深紅、死をまとった灰色…絶望と狂気の万華鏡…」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Die Farben dieses Ortes sind mit fleckigem Schmerz bedeckt ... strahlendes Violett, schwärzlicher Purpur und tödliches Grau ... Ein Kaleidoskop aus Verzweiflung und Wahnsinn ..."
languages.original_text: "The colours of this place are flecked with sparks of pain — bright scarlet, blackish crimson, deathly grey... A kaleidoscope of despair and madness..."

traits.locale_text: "Die Farben dieses Ortes sind mit fleckigem Schmerz bedeckt ... strahlendes Violett, schwärzlicher Purpur und tödliches Grau ... Ein Kaleidoskop aus Verzweiflung und Wahnsinn ..."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Ce lieu est jalonné de teintes douloureuses : rouge vif, carmin sombre, gris funeste... Un véritable kaléidoscope de désespoir et de démence... »
languages.original_text: "The colours of this place are flecked with sparks of pain — bright scarlet, blackish crimson, deathly grey... A kaleidoscope of despair and madness..."

traits.locale_text: « Ce lieu est jalonné de teintes douloureuses : rouge vif, carmin sombre, gris funeste... Un véritable kaléidoscope de désespoir et de démence... »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Bu mekânın renkleri acı kıvılcımlarıyla benek benek. Parlak al, siyaha çalan kızıl, ölümcül gri... Sanki çaresizlik ve deliliğin kaleydoskobu."
languages.original_text: "The colours of this place are flecked with sparks of pain — bright scarlet, blackish crimson, deathly grey... A kaleidoscope of despair and madness..."
